<DIR> Crew Matters
Welfare
[iOS & Android] [Zoom SDK]
click to expand

Project Details

A welfare and communication app developed for the Isle of Man Ship Registry to support seafarers’ wellbeing worldwide. The app provides access to welfare resources, mental health support, news updates, and direct communication with maritime services. It was one of the first flag-state-backed apps of its kind, featured in maritime press and officially launched on World Maritime Day 2020.

Stack:C#, .NET, Xamarin Forms
Year:2020
Status:archived
2020-04
